item.title: Trump privately indicates Elon Musk could step back from current role: Sources
item.description: President Donald Trump indicated to top advisers that Elon Musk could be taking a step back from his current role, sources familiar with the matter to...

item.title: Rep. Pettersen says it was 'difficult' decision to bring infant son to House floor
item.description: Democratic Rep. Brittany Pettersen said the decision to bring her 9-week-old was "difficult" but illustrated the need to pass the petition.

item.title: WATCH: ‘Bloody all over’: Teen attacked by aggressive sea lion
item.description: Phoebe Beltran, 15, was taking a swim test for the cadet lifeguard program in Long Beach, California, when she was attacked.

item.title: Trump's 'Liberation Day' plans 'still very fluid' as he gambles big on tariff policy

item.title: WATCH: Actor Val Kilmer dead at 65
item.description: The actor, best known for his roles in “Top Gun,” “Tombstone” and “The Doors,” died Tuesday in Los Angeles, his daughter told The New York Times.
